power.title: Astral Eyes
power.fluff: Your eyes exude the light that bathes the Astral Sea, sharpening your sight and allowing you to perceive subtle details with ease

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of your next turn, you gain darkvision and a +2 power bonus to Insight checks and Perception checks.

section.name: Sustain Minor:
section.text: The effect persists until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Special:
section.text: As part of any rest, you can choose to expend a healing surge to enhance this effect.
If you do, the power is expended until you finish a long rest and you gain darkvision until you regain this power. You can also use the following action at-will:

section.name: Minor Action:
section.text: Until the end of your next turn, you gain a +2 power bonus to Insight checks and Perception checks.

power.title: Chaos Armor
power.fluff: Power flows around you, girding you against the elements and lashing your enemies

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Choose acid, cold, fire, lightning or thunder. This power gains the corresponding keyword.
Until the end of the encounter, you gain resist 5 to the chosen damage type.

In addition, whenever an enemy scores a critical hit against you or hits you with an attack during your own turn, choose one enemy within 5 squares of you. The chosen enemy takes damage of the chosen type equal to your Constitution modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus.

section.name: Level 11:
section.text: Equal to 4 + your Constitution modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: Equal to 8 + your Constitution modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus.
